creator: Vawsum Schools Pvt Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Vawsum has revolutionized Learning across 1000+ institutes. 4 primary Areas of focus are:
1. Digital Learning
2. Secured and instant Communication
3. Child Safety
4. Institute Branding

Now, schools can share notes, class updates and educational videos at a click of a button to enrich students’ learning. Teachers can reach out to individual parents to give personal feedback and make a positive impact in the student's growth. Besides, real time attendance updates, in app fees payments and bus tracking enhance child’s safety.

Vawsum's hardware free, easy to use application with regional language support and integrated SMS has receive positive feedback from across schools. Schools have seen an increase in admissions and enjoyed favorable coverage in local media.

Vawsum has been recognized By Niti Ayog, Department of Industrial Policy & Promotion, IIMC Innovation Park, University of Delhi, TATA and TIE among others.

1. Digital Learning
2. Secured and instant Communication
3. Child Safety
4. Institute Branding

Now, schools can share notes, class updates and educational videos at a click of a button to enrich students’ learning. Teachers can reach out to individual parents to give personal feedback and make a positive impact in the student's growth. Besides, real time attendance updates, in app fees payments and bus tracking enhance child’s safety.

Vawsum's hardware free, easy to use application with regional language support and integrated SMS has receive positive feedback from across schools. Schools have seen an increase in admissions and enjoyed favorable coverage in local media.

Vawsum has been recognized By Niti Ayog, Department of Industrial Policy & Promotion, IIMC Innovation Park, University of Delhi, TATA and TIE among others.

3. Child Safety
4. Institute Branding

The teachers of the school can now share files (pdf, ppt, xls, doc, txt), photos, videos with their students. Using this, all the core functionalities of the app like document sharing (reference material), assessment posting by the teachers, reply to the assessments by the students, uploading a leave certificate, posting online examination questions by the teachers and their responses by the students, 1:1 communication of the students and the teachers can be established.

Now, schools can share notes, class updates and educational videos at a click of a button to enrich students’ learning. Teachers can reach out to individual parents to give personal feedback and make a positive impact in the student's growth. Besides, real time attendance updates, in app fees payments and bus tracking enhance child’s safety.

Vawsum's hardware free, easy to use application with regional language support and integrated SMS has receive positive feedback from across schools. Schools have seen an increase in admissions and enjoyed favorable coverage in local media.

Vawsum has been recognized By Niti Ayog, Department of Industrial Policy & Promotion, IIMC Innovation Park, University of Delhi, TATA and TIE among others.

creator: Vawsum Schools Pvt Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Vawsum is an all-in-one school management system or ERP that helps schools in India streamline their administrative tasks, engage parents and teachers, and enhance student learning outcomes. With Vawsum, you can manage attendance, fees, exams, homework, and more, all from a single platform.

Attendance Management:
With Vawsum, you can easily mark and track attendance for your students in real-time. The system generates detailed attendance reports that help you keep track of your students' attendance records. You can also set up automatic notifications for parents and teachers in case of absenteeism or late arrivals.

Fee Management:
Vawsum makes fee management easy for schools in India. You can collect fees, generate receipts, and track payments easily. The system generates automatic reminders for parents and teachers regarding upcoming fee payments and due dates. You can also generate fee reports and analytics to get a better understanding of your school's financial health.

Exam Management:
With Vawsum, you can create and schedule exams easily. The system generates result reports instantly, giving you a comprehensive overview of your students' performance. You can also set up automatic notifications for parents and teachers regarding exam schedules, results, and other updates.

Homework Management:
Vawsum allows you to assign homework and track completion status easily. You can send notifications to parents and teachers regarding homework assignments, due dates, and completion status. The system generates homework reports that help you keep track of your students' progress.

Communication:
Vawsum makes communication easy between parents, teachers, and administrators. You can engage with parents and teachers via chat, announcements, and circulars. You can also send automated notifications regarding important updates, events, and deadlines. The system also allows you to send personalized messages to individual parents or groups.

Timetable Management:
With Vawsum, you can schedule classes, manage substitutions, and view timetables easily. The system generates detailed reports that help you keep track of your school's timetable and class schedules.

Transport Management:
Vawsum allows you to track buses and manage routes and stops easily. The system generates detailed reports that help you keep track of your school's transport system and ensure the safety of your students.

Vawsum is designed for schools of all sizes and offers easy integration with existing school systems. Our user-friendly interface and powerful features make Vawsum the ultimate school management system for your school in India.

Keywords:
school management system, school erp, school software, attendance management, fee management, exam management, homework management, communication, timetable management, transport management, India, school administration, parent engagement, student performance.
